instructions.Step1: Boil 2 eggs on medium heat for 8 mins

instructions.Step2: Break the boiled eggs in small pieces

instructions.Step3: Add 1/4 teaspoon of salt, sprinkle some peppers and add 3 tablespoon of mayonnaise and mix all together

instructions.Step4: Spread on your favorite toast and Enjoy!

instructions.Step1: Boil 6 eggs on high heat for 10 minutes

instructions.Step2: Rinse under cold water continuously for 1 minute and carefully peel egg shells

instructions.Step3: Slice the eggs in half lengthwise and remove yolks to a medium bowl

instructions.Step4: Mash the yolks into a fine crumble using a fork. Add mayonnaise, vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper, and mix well

instructions.Step5: Place the whites on a serving platter and evenly disperse heaping teaspoons of the yolk mixture into the egg whites

instructions.Step1: Combine chicken broth, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil on high heat

instructions.Step2: Stir together cornstarch and water to dissolve cornstarch; pour into the boiling broth

instructions.Step3: Lower to medium heat and pour in beaten egg while stirring gently

instructions.Step4: Once the egg is cooked, season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with chives and Enjoy!

instructions.Step1: Whisk together the first eight ingredients.

instructions.Step2: In a large skillet pan, heat butter over medium heat.

instructions.Step3: Pour in egg mixture; cook and stir until eggs are thickened and no liquid egg remains.

instructions.Step4: Sprinkle with additional minced herbs and Enjoy!

recipes.name: Cheesy Egg Puffs
ingredients: 1 tablespoon plus 1/2 cup butter, cubed, divided

instructions.Step1: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder and salt

instructions.Step2: In a skillet, saute the mushrooms and onions in 1 tablespoon butter until tender.

instructions.Step3: In another bowl, combine eggs and cheeses. Melt remaining 1/2 cup butter; add to egg mixture. Stir into dry ingredients along with mushroom mixture.

instructions.Step4: Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 350° for 35-40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.

instructions.Step5: Carefully run the knife around the edge of muffin cups, serve and Enjoy!

instructions.Step2: On a medium heat , Pour in egg mixture in your pan.

instructions.Step3: As eggs set, push cooked portions toward the center, letting uncooked eggs flow underneath

instructions.Step4: When eggs are thickened and no liquid egg remains, top 1 half with remaining ingredients.

instructions.Step5: Fold omelet in half and Enjoy!

instructions.Step1: In a bowl, combine eggs, celery, mayonnaise, nuts, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper; mix well.

instructions.Step2: Pour into a greased 11x7-in. baking dish.

instructions.Step3: Sprinkle with cheese and potato chips.

instructions.Step4: Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 25 minutes or until heated through.

recipes.name: Fluffy Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 1/4 cup evaporated milk or half-and-half cream

instructions.Step1: In a bowl, whisk eggs, milk, salt and pepper.

instructions.Step2: On a medium heat, with oil; pour in egg mixture.

instructions.Step3: Add and stir in cheese sauce.

instructions.Step4: Cook eggs until thickened and Enjoy!

instructions.Step1: Crack an egg into and slowly add it to the medium heat skillet.

instructions.Step2: Cover with a tight lid and cook, uninterrupted, until the whites are completely set but the yolks are still runny, 2 to 2 1/2 minutes.

instructions.Step4: Slide the eggs out of the skillet onto your favorite toast and Enjoy!

recipes.name: Four Cheese Baked Eggs
ingredients: 3 cups grated Gruyere or Swiss cheese
2 tablespoons minced chives or chopped green onions

instructions.Step1: Preheat the oven to 350° and Beat ricotta and cream cheese until smooth.

instructions.Step2: Add eggs, butter, salt and pepper; beat until blended.

instructions.Step3: In another bowl, whisk flour with baking powder and add to egg mixture.

instructions.Step5: Pour in all mixture in baking pan and sprinkle with Parmesan on top.

instructions.Step7: Let stand 10 minutes before cutting and Enjoy!
